1. 计数原理 Counting Principles

1.1. 加法原理 The Sum Rule

加法原理(the sum rule)：If SSS and TTT are 不相交的(disjoint) finite sets, then

∣S∪T∣=∣S∣+∣T∣|S\cup T| = |S| +|T|∣S∪T∣=∣S∣+∣T∣

1.2. 乘法原理 The Product Rule

乘法原理(the product rule)：If SSS and TTT are finite sets, then

∣S×T∣=∣S∣×∣T∣|S \times T| = |S| \times |T|∣S×T∣=∣S∣×∣T∣

Here S×TS \times TS×T denotes the Cartesian product of sets SSS and TTT.

1.3. 容斥原理 The Inclusion-Exclusion principle

容斥原理(the inclusion-exclusion principle = subtraction rule)：If SSS and TTT are finite sets, then

∣S∪T∣=∣S∣+∣T∣−∣S∩T∣|S\cup T| = |S| + |T| - |S\cap T|∣S∪T∣=∣S∣+∣T∣−∣S∩T∣

1.4. 树形图 Tree Diagrams

一种用树形图(tree diagram) 来计数的思想：To use trees in counting, we use a branch to represent each possible choice. We represent the possible outcomes by the leaves.

Solution

2. 鸽笼原理 The Pigeonhole Principle

鸽笼原理(the pigeonhole principle)

If kkk is a positive integer and k+1k+1k+1 or more objects are placed into kkk boxes, then there is at least one box containing two or more of the objects.

广义鸽笼原理(the generalized pigeonhole principle)

If nnn objects are placed into kkk boxes, then there is at least one box containing at least ⌈n/k⌉\lceil n/k \rceil⌈n/k⌉ objects.

Chapter 6.2 - Example 6

Every sequence of n2+1n^2+1n2+1 distinct integers contains a subsequence of length n+1n + 1n+1 that is either strictly increasing or strictly decreasing.

Solution by myself

Dilworth 定理指出，对于任意有限偏序集，其最长反链长度必等于最小链划分中链的数目。故命题“最长上升子序列的长度为 nnn” 的对偶命题为“非升子序列的最小划分数为 nnn”。

对于原数列，若其最长上升子序列的大于等于 n+1n+1n+1，则问题解决；否则存在一组 nnn 个下降子序列的划分。根据鸽笼原理，其中至少有一个的长度大于 nnn，即可找到一个长度大于等于 n+1n+1n+1 的下降子序列。

4. 组合证明 Combinatorial Proofs

A 数两次的证明方法(double counting proof) uses counting arguments to prove that both sides of an identity count the same objects, but in different ways.

A 基于双射的证明方法(bijective proof) shows that there is a bijection between the sets of objects counted by the two sides of the identity.
